body.p: This version of the TEI is an maintenance release to solve issues which were found after the release of 2.4.0. These related primarily to the formatting and content of the TEI Lite documentation in English and French.

The opportunity has been taken to correct an omission made when the element precision was introduced in 2099, explained on the bug report. This gives the element attributes from the att.ranging class. Because this changes the schema, the release goes from 2.4.* to 2.5.*.
